title: OTAs takeaways & mailbag
itunes:title: OTAs takeaways & mailbag
description:
A room filled with heroes -- Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Chris Wesseling and Marc Sessler -- react to the latest NFL news including Adrian Peterson's contract situation, Ryan Clady's injury and Chip Kelly's response to LeSean McCoy (17:00). The guys then give their takeaways from OTAs (34:09) and answer your mailbag questions.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
